metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45158 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in web2py 2.24.1 and earlier.When the product is configured to use notifySendHandler for logging (notthe default configuration), a crafted web request may execute an arbitraryOS command on the web server using the product.

criterions.comment: web2py package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
